subject: How are you doing today, Note:
body:
How are you doing today, Note: that after my meeting with office of president of the united states with senate advice and consent, World bank, united nations and international monetary fund (IMF), they agreed to pay you $10,000,000.00.(TEN Million Dollars only) as your compensation as scam victims .Congratulations, your name was among the list to be paid $10.Million Dollars compensation payment.
Make your choice of your payment from our payment methods so that your Fund  will be  released to you, (1) ATM Card with us.(2) bank to bank.(3) Cash delivery to your doorstep 
Kindly send your personal
details to  us to prove your identification.
1.Name........................
2.Shipping Address................
3.Telephone Number .................
4.Age and Marital Status. .............
5.Occupation.....................
6. Payment method.. ..............
Name: Mr. John Carroll Williams
Federal Reserve Bank New York
Address: 33 Liberty St, New York, NY 10045, USA

subject: Re: How are you doing today, Note:
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. 

Wow, that's quite some news! I can't believe my name was on the list to receive such a large sum. It's really exciting and unexpected. Could you please tell me more about how this came to be? How was my name chosen for this?

As for the payment methods, could you explain each one in detail? What are the pros and cons of each method? 

I'm sorry but I don't feel comfortable sharing personal details online. Is there another way we can verify my identity without sharing sensitive information?

Best wishes,
John

subject: FROM Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
ATTN: JOHN

I am Mr. John Carroll Williams the President and CEO Federal Reserve Bank New York. This transaction is lottery won by your e-mail address via online active email address selected from sponsor of Coca Cola Company award and United Nation. With due respect and utmost courtesy, we write to officially regarding the release of your award Winning fund valued sum of $10,000,000,000.00 USD from Coca Cola Company which was approved for release via ATM CARD delivery to your doorstep.


The management of Federal Reserve Bank New York department wish to notify you that this honorable bank Federal Reserve Bank New York) was instructed by Coca Cola Company in conjunction with the US Finance Ministry and UNITED NATION Ambassador to U.S on Winning payment matters which they have empowered our bank Federal Reserve Bank New York after much consultation and consideration to handle all Winning payments and release them to their appropriate beneficiaries accordingly.


I am Mr. John Carroll Williams the President and CEO Federal Reserve Bank New York, your appointed bank officer who is working on your behalf for the actualization of your fund to program ATM CARD to delivery in your doorstep. Be well informed that our bank Federal Reserve Bank New York was successful.


To faster this transaction to receive an ATM CARD immediate effect. The only cost you will spend to receive this fund of ATM CARD IS $500 until we deliver it to you, Since you are afraid of sending your personal details online i will give you my telephone number you can text  your information to me or through WhatsApp's, +1347-227-4140, don't be afraid Of anything because this is real and we are here to protect you to make sure that you receive your fund as soon as you follow our instruction. i send you my work ID to proof myself to you.

Your immediate compliance will be in your very best interest. If at any time you have questions, concerns or comments, please contact us as we strive to ensure that you will always receive a prompt and courteous attention.


Name: Mr. John Carroll Williams
Federal Reserve Bank New York
Address: 33 Liberty St, New York, NY 10045, USA

subject: Re: FROM Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected surprise! I'm not sure how my email address was selected for such a prestigious award from the Coca Cola Company and United Nations, but it's certainly exciting news.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. How exactly was my email chosen? And could you please explain more about this ATM card delivery process? It sounds very convenient, but I'd like to understand it better.

Also, you mentioned a cost associated with receiving the ATM card. Could you clarify what that cost is for?

Looking forward to your response!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: FROM Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:

Thank you for your mail, i have explan this to you so that you will understand it, This transaction is lottery won by your e-mail address freeddomgossip.uk via active email address selected from sponsor of Coca Cola Company award and United Nation. our job here to release the fund to you and i will like you to follow our advice so that we will do our job to relesae your fund to you.

About the ATM CARD we will set up an account of ATM CARD in your name to our bank to prgram the Card delivery it in your doorstep, the cost of the $500, we will use it to obtain one document in your name from US Government to back your card so that when we delivery it to you the will not stop it. So go ahead and send your information so that we will use it to set up the account.

Federal Reserve Bank New York

body:

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

The name of the document is Approval Certificate in your name and as soon as it obtains i will forward it to you before we delivering  your card to you. don't worry yourself because we are here to protect you to make sure that you have access of this fund.

Hope t hear from you.

body:

body:

Best wishes,
John
